title: Afghanistan's last finance minister Khalid Payenda now drives Uber in US - Hindustan Times
content: Afghanistan's last finance minister Khalid Payenda now drives Uber in US  Hindustan Times
description: Khalid Payenda who co-founded Afghanistan's first private university now drives an Uber cab in Washington as all his savings have been spent. And his teaching job at Georgetown University pays $2,000 per semester.
